code: import React from'react';import'./Notifications.css';import closeIcon from'./close-icon.png';import{getLatestNotification}from'./utils';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notifications=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{background:'transparent',border:'none',float:'right'},"aria-label":"Close",onClick:()=>console.log('Close button has been clicked'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:closeIcon,alt:"close-icon",style:{width:'30px',height:'30px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:getLatestNotification()})})]})]})});};export default Notifications;
